headers.value: default-src 'self' https://*.google.com https://*.googleapis.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.google.com https://apis.google.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.googleapis.com https://*.google.com https://*.vercel.app; img-src 'self' data: https://*.googleusercontent.com https://*.google.com https://res.cloudinary.com https://images.unsplash.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.google.com https://*.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://accounts.google.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com;
